i1.name: Stage Presence
description:
{{sbc|Innate - Echo:}} '''Seraphine''' [[champion ability|basic abilities]] generate a [[stack]] of ''Echo'', stacking up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, '''Seraphine's''' next basic ability casts an additional time at no cost after a {{rutngt|0.01}} delay, consuming all ''Echo'' stacks after the [[cast time]] of the second cast completes.
'''Seraphine''' gains maximum stacks of ''Echo'' when the game starts and upon [[death|respawning]].

{{sbc|Innate - Harmony:}} '''Seraphine's''' abilities grant a ''Note'' to her and all nearby allied {{tip|champions}}. ''Notes'' last 6 seconds and up to 4 of them can be active on each unit at a time. The duration of ''Notes'' refreshes on '''Seraphine's''' subsequent ability casts while the holder is within ''Harmony's'' [[aura]] or is hit by {{ai|Encore|Seraphine}}.

'''Seraphine's''' [[basic attack]]s while any amount of ''Notes'' are active for either her or allies have an {{tip|uncancelable windup}} and gain {{sti|25 '''bonus''' attack range}} per ''Note'' and fire all of them at the target, each one dealing {{as|{{pp|4;8;14;24|1;6;11;16}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|6 to 9|1;6;11;16}} AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}} upon arrival, reduced by 75% for ''Notes'' from allies and increased by 200% against {{tip|minions}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Echo: Seraphine champion ability generate a stack of Echo, stacking up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, Seraphine's next basic ability casts an additional time at no cost after a Unknown value: rutngt 0.01 delay, consuming all Echo stacks after the cast time of the second cast completes.
Seraphine gains maximum stacks of Echo when the game starts and upon death.
Innate - Harmony: Seraphine's abilities grant a Note to her and all nearby allied champions. Notes last 6 seconds and up to 4 of them can be active on each unit at a time. The duration of Notes refreshes on Seraphine's subsequent ability casts while the holder is within Harmony's aura or is hit by Encore.
Seraphine's basic attacks while any amount of Notes are active for either her or allies have an uncancelable windup and gain 25 bonus attack range per Note and fire all of them at the target, each one dealing 1;6;11;16 ‒ undefined (+ 1;6;11;16 ‒ undefined AP) magic damage upon arrival, reduced by 75% for Notes from allies and increased by 200% against minions.
i1.notes:
'''Echo Details:'''
* ''Echo's'' stacks are represented by a stack counter underneath '''Seraphine's''' health bar.
* '''Seraphine's''' basic abilities alternate their icons between 3 different ones each, depending on the current amount of stacks she has.
* The second cast must complete for ''Echo'' stacks to be consumed; if the cast time does not finish or does not begin at all, '''Seraphine''' will keep her stacks.
* The additional cast is completely free; the {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} cost and {{sti|cooldown}} of the mimicked ability are unaffected by it.
* The additional cast counts as a separate {{tip|cast instance}} for the purpose of e.g. {{ri|Electrocute}} or {{ri|Conqueror}}.
'''Harmony Details:'''
* Against minions, each ''Note'' from '''Seraphine''' deals {{as|{{pp|4*3;8*3;14*3;24*3|1;6;11;16}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|(6 to 9)*3|1;6;11;16}} AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}} and each note from allies deals {{as|{{pp|4*3*0.25;8*3*0.25;14*3*0.25;24*3*0.25|1;6;11;16}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|(6 to 9)*3*0.25|1;6;11;16}} AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}}.
* Against non-minions, each ''Note'' from '''Seraphine''' deals normal damage and each note from allies deals {{as|{{pp|4*0.25;8*0.25;14*0.25;24*0.25|1;6;11;16}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|(6 to 9)*0.25|1;6;11;16}} AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}}.
* ''Notes'' will also be gained if '''Seraphine''' uses the actives for {{ii|Galeforce}} or {{ii|Everfrost}}.{{bug|2}}
* ''Notes'' orbit at a radius of 100 from the center of their holder and they fire from this location.
* The empowered attack cannot {{tip|critically strike}}.{{bug}}
* ''Notes'' are fired one after another with a short delay.
* ''Harmony'' does '''not''' grant ''Notes'' to {{tip|clone|clones}}.
** This allows enemies to see whether a nearby ally of '''Seraphine''' is a clone.
** This means '''Seraphine''' can only have up to 20 ''Notes'', which includes her and 4 allied champions. This is increased to 24 ''Notes'' on {{tip|Hexakill}} as there is an additional allied champion.
*** At 20 ''Notes'', '''Seraphine''' next basic attack will gain {{sti|500 '''bonus''' attack range}}.
* ''Harmony'' grants ''Notes'' even if the ally is {{tip|untargetable}}.
* The ''Notes'' will fire from allies regardless of how far they are away from '''Seraphine'''.
* '''Seraphine''' gains a faint blue attack range indicator when there are ''Notes'' present.
* ''Notes'' do not discharge when attacking {{tip|wards}}, allowing '''Seraphine''' to attack them from increased range multiple times.
'''Other Details:'''
* '''Seraphine''', while alive, will play music if there is at least one ally champion nearby.
** This is audible to '''Seraphine''' and all allied champions that are in range of ''Harmony'', indicative of if they can receive a ''Note'' or not.

q1.name: High Note
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Seraphine''' hurls a soundwave to the target location that quickly expands in a radius upon impact, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies in the area, increased by {{as|{{pp|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|0 to 50 for 11|0 to 75|formula=5% per 7.5% of target's '''missing''' health, capped at 75% '''missing''' health}}|health}}.
''High Note will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Seraphine hurls a soundwave to the target location that quickly expands in a radius upon impact, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area, increased by 0 to 75 ‒ undefined.
High Note will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
q1.notes:
* ''High Note'' uses a modified icon for the [[File:High Note 2.png|20px|border]] second and [[File:High Note 3.png|20px|border]] third stack of {{ai|Stage Presence|Seraphine}}.
* The maximum damage of ''High Note'' uses a {{ccs|cosmetic critical strike|magic|tip=false|link=true}}.
* ''High Note'' will fire from wherever ''Seraphine'' is at the end of the cast time.
* The impact delay depends solely on the missile speed. It is 0 seconds to {{fd|0.75}} seconds (after end of cast time) within the standard cast radius, but can be increased further by '''Seraphine''' being moved away from the cast location during the cast time.
* {{pending for test}} The area of effect is covered via expansion in several rings (similar to {{ais|R|Lissandra}} area of effect) and targets can only be hit once.
* The range indicator for the target range has a radius of 950 units, but the center of ''High Note'' can only be cast up to 900 units. The area indicator shows the proper 350 are of effect radius and cast location.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ % AP)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ % AP)

w1.name: Surround Sound
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Seraphine''' empowers herself and nearby allied {{tip|champions}} with her music. She grants herself {{as|20%|ms}} {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} {{sti|ms|{{as|decaying '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and a {{pp|50*1.5 to 54*1.5 for 5;56*1.5 to 62*1.5 for 4;64*1.5 to 104*1.5 for 5;114*1.5 to 150*1.5|formula=75 + 1.5 per level until level 5, then + 3 per level until level 10, then + 15 per level until level 15, then + 18 per level}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}} {{tip|shield}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds. Allies are granted {{as|8%|ms}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.6}}% per 100 AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} and a {{pp|50 to 54 for 5;56 to 62 for 4;64 to 104 for 5;114 to 150|formula=50 + 1 per level until level 5, then + 2 per level until level 10, then + 10 per level until level 15, then + 12 per level}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{tip|shield}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.

''Surround Sound'' will also {{tip|heal}} '''Seraphine''' and all nearby allied champions for {{as|5% {{as|(+ {{fd|1.125}}% per 100 AP)}} of '''missing''' health|health}} per {{tt|ally|including Seraphine herself}} after its effect ends if '''Seraphine''' already had a {{tip|shield}} at the time of cast.
''Surround Sound's effects can stack up to 2 times.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Seraphine empowers herself and nearby allied champions with her music. She grants herself 20% (+ 4% per 100 AP) decaying bonus movement speed and a 50*1.5undefined − 54*1.5 for 5;56*1.5undefined (based on level) (+ 45% AP) shield for 2.5 seconds. Allies are granted 8% (+ 1.6% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed and a 50undefined − 54 for 5;56undefined (based on level) (+ 30% AP) shield for 2.5 seconds.
Surround Sound will also heal Seraphine and all nearby allied champions for 5% (+ 1.125% per 100 AP) of missing health per ally after its effect ends if Seraphine already had a shield at the time of cast.
Surround Sound's effects can stack up to 2 times.
w1.notes:
* ''Surround Sound'' uses a modified icon for the [[File:Surround Sound 2.png|20px|border]] second and [[File:Surround Sound 3.png|20px|border]] third stack of {{ai|Stage Presence|Seraphine}}.
* All effects are gained at the start of the cast time.
* '''Seraphine''' can move during the cast time.
* ''Surround Sound's'' {{tip|shield}} buff can have up to 2 stacks, for a total of 200% shield strength at a time.
** Most shields in the game can only have one stack, refreshing their shield strength when reapplied.
** {{pending for test}} StackingType <!--See: https://leagueoflegends.fandom.com/wiki/User:CaenenLoL/Buffs_data_template_template-->
* ''Surround Sound'' will empower from any {{tip|shield}} that '''Seraphine''' has. It does not have to be sourced from ''Surround Sound''.
* Casting ''Surround Sound'' during the {{fd|2.5}}-second delay refreshes the delay.
* The {{tip|heal}} affects {{tip|clone|clones}} and counts them for increasing the '''missing''' health percentage.
* A large indicator similar to {{iis|Redemption}} signals the heal area of effect and delay.
* The heal will be canceled and the indicator disappears when '''Seraphine''' dies.
* The heal occurs instantly on '''Seraphine''' and all nearby allied champions once the delay ends.
** There is a missile that flows through all allied champions which can be blocked by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}. The heal is unaffected by this.
* ''Surround Sound'' will affect {{tip|untargetable}} allies.

e1.name: Beat Drop
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Seraphine''' fires a heavy soundwave in a line in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within its path and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 99% for 1 second.
Enemies that are already {{tip|slow|slowed}} are also {{tip|root|rooted}} for the same duration.
Enemies that are {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|ground|grounded}} are also {{tip|stun|stunned}} for the same duration.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Seraphine fires a heavy soundwave in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies within its path and slowing them by 99% for 1 second.
Enemies that are already slowed are also rooted for the same duration.
Enemies that are immobilized or grounded are also stunned for the same duration.
e1.notes:
* ''Beat Drop'' uses a modified icon for the [[File:Beat Drop 2.png|20px|border]] second and [[File:Beat Drop 3.png|20px|border]] third stack of {{ai|Stage Presence|Seraphine}}.
* ''Beat Drop'' may still be empowered even if the disable ends shortly after the ability hits.
* The {{tip|root}} and the {{tip|stun}} cannot apply at the same time.
** The root will only apply if the target is {{tip|slow|slowed}} and not {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|ground|grounded}}.
*** The stun will apply as normal; it does not consider if the target is {{tip|slow|slowed}}.
** The root will be overridden by the stun if the target is hit by ''Beat Drop'' again while they were rooted by it.
* A quarter note will appear next to an enemy {{tip|champion}} while they are {{tip|slow|slowed}} and two quarter notes tied will appear if they are {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|ground|grounded}}.
** This indicates if ''Beat Drop'' will apply an additional [[crowd control]] effect if it strikes the target.
* ''Beat Drop'' fires from the finishing cast position.

r1.name: Encore
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Seraphine''' projects a captivating force in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies struck in its path and {{tip|charm|charms}} them for a few seconds, during which they are also {{tip|sight|revealed}} and {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 40%, increasing by 15% every {{fd|0.25}} seconds over the duration, up to 99%.

''Encore's'' projectile resets its remaining travel distance whenever it strikes an allied or enemy {{tip|champion}}, excluding '''Seraphine'''. Additionally, all struck allied champions gain 4 {{ai|Stage Presence|Seraphine|Notes}}.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Seraphine projects a captivating force in the target direction that deals magic damage to all enemies struck in its path and charms them for a few seconds, during which they are also revealed and slowed by 40%, increasing by 15% every 0.25 seconds over the duration, up to 99%.
Encore's projectile resets its remaining travel distance whenever it strikes an allied or enemy champion, excluding Seraphine. Additionally, all struck allied champions gain 4 Notes.
r1.notes:
* ''Encore'' has two cast times. Both last {{fd|0.5}} seconds. The wave will always project after the first cast time, and the second cast time only serves as a {{tip|lockout|lock out}} for '''Seraphine'''.
** '''Seraphine''' cannot buffer casts during the first cast time, but she may do so during the second cast time.
* {{tip|clone|Clones}} also count for ''Encore's'' extension.
* ''Encore'' will not extend on enemy champions that are {{tip|untargetable}}, but will do so for allied champions.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will also prevent ''Encore'' from extending.
* ''Encore'' fires from '''Seraphine's''' location at the end of the initial cast time.
* There is no limit as to how many times the wave can extend.
* Each ''Encore'' cast cannot extend from the same {{tip|champion}} more than once.
** {{pending for test}}: {{tip|zombie state|Champions that died, clearing marker buffs}}
